Object.Name: Parking Lot
Object.Description1: This custom object represents a parking lot and provides a summary of the parking spots and vehicle counts that are connected to it. The parking lot object is available on the server.

Item.Name: Parking Lot ID
Item.Description: Identity of the parking lot, based on the host name. When multiple LwM2M clients run on the same host, used a "-N" sequence number to make the distinction.

Item.Name: Lot name
Item.Description: The name of the parking lot, such that parking spots and vehicle counters register at this server. This is a non-volatile value, such that after a system restart, the parking lot might have a different name and attracts different LWM2M clients. The name of the parking lot is used in the mDNS/DNS-SD advertisement.

Item.Name: Capacity
Item.Description: Number of spots for vehicles, including the registered parking spot clients.

Item.Name: Reservations
Item.Description: Number of reservations on the parking lot

Item.Name: Vehicles
Item.Description: Number of available parking spots, excluding the registered parking spot clients.

Item.Name: Free
Item.Description: Number of free parking spots, which is equal to Capacity - Vehicles - Reservations
